pendingUser.description: User with pending status - has restricted access (cannot view expert details)
pendingUser.note: Username field removed - email is now used for authentication

activeUser.description: User with active status - has full access to all features
activeUser.note: Username field removed - email is now used for authentication

adminUser.description: Admin user with admin role - has access to admin panel
adminUser.note: Username field removed - email is now used for authentication
